title: Leading cause of ransomware infection 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 6 number of Cause of ransomware infections.
Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has the highest Percentage of respondents and Malicious websites/web ads has the lowest Percentage of respondents.
The difference of Percentage of respondents between the highest and lowest Cause of ransomware infection is 51.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 6 number of Cause of ransomware infections.
The Percentage of respondents is highest at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and lowest at Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 6 number of Cause of ransomware infections.
Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has the highest Percentage of respondents and Malicious websites/web ads has the lowest Percentage of respondents.
The difference of Percentage of respondents between the highest and lowest Cause of ransomware infection is 51.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 6 number of Cause of ransomware infections.
Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has the highest Percentage of respondents and Malicious websites/web ads has the lowest Percentage of respondents.
The second highest Percentage of respondents is appeared to be the Cause of ransomware infection Lack of cyber security training.
The highest Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has 51.0 more Percentage of respondents than the lowest Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.

Percentage of respondents at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails is 67.0 , second place is Lack of cyber security training at 36.0, and thirdly is Weak passwords/access management at 30.0.
Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads, and Report clickbait share the same value 16.0.
The average Percentage of respondents in all 6 Cause of ransomware infections is 31.67.
Summing up the values of all Cause of ransomware infections, we get total 190.0.
